product_name: The North Face Base Camp Flip-Flops - Men's
long_description: Around base camp or simply around town, your feet will thank you for wearing these massaging flip-flops from The North Face. Hypalon(R) polyethylene straps are durable and stain resistant; jersey lining is soft against tops of feet. Soft EVA midsoles with anatomic arch supports feature egg-crate inspired topsoles to massage your feet as you walk. Rubber outsoles provide traction and add life to your flip flops. Available in full sizes only.
short_description: Around base camp or simply around town, your feet will thank you for wearing these massaging flip-flops from The North Face.
